text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
(The vaunted Tracen Academy<n>attracts only the most gifted
of<n>students.)

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
(Those born with exceptional racing<n>instincts. Those whose
greatest<n>purpose in life is to run. Those who<n>never stop
climbing to greater and<n>greater heights.)

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: And me... What can I becomehere?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: (Then, one day... one fateful day...)

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Maruzensky is shooting farther and<n>farther ahead! Three
lengths, now four<n>lengths in front—there's no stopping<n>
her!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Hehe. Here I go!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Can we really call this a mere<n>scrimmage? What a show of
strength<n>from Maruzensky! And now, she flies<n>across the
finish!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: (A flash of light darted past... and lit<n>up my world.)

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: A few months later...

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
As I'm taking a stroll early one<n>morning, I see students
doing some<n>light running on the track.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text:
Nice going. Your form was perfect!<n>But those last 400
meters had you<n>lagging behind your target pace.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, maybe aiming for such a fast<n>pace right off the bat
wasn't a good<n>idea. I'll hold off on that until my<n>cardio
improves a bit more.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
Okay, tomorrow I'll dial down the<n>pace and work back up
little by little!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text:
Hehe. Yes, that sounds like a plan.<n>Now, I will say... call me
biased, but<n>you've improved quite a lot recently.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
Ehehe, thank you! Actually, I think<n>you're right—it's like I've
sprouted<n>and shot up all at once!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
If I keep working at it step by step,<n>then s-someday, I... I
might even be<n>able to go toe to toe with Maruzen...<n>
maybe?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Or not! Ahaha, forget I said anything.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text:
No, I think that's a wonderful dream.<n>Oh, it's about time for
breakfast. Were<n>you planning on...

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
Oh, I still have some drills to get<n>through, so I'll head over
once I'm<n>done! Thank you so much, Ardan!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: No worries. I'll go on ahead, then.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: All right, let's see what's left...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Muttering intently to herself, the<n>young racer scribbles away
in her<n>notebook. As I watch with curiosity, I<n>hear footsteps
approaching.

text_block_list.name: Groundskeeper
text_block_list.text:
That kid there caught your interest,<n>Trainer? Her name's
Sakura Chiyono<n>O. She was with a friend today, but<n>
usually she's at it all by herself.

text_block_list.name: Groundskeeper
text_block_list.text:
You won't see her doing<n>back-to-back hill sprints or
anything<n>like that, but she's here running<n>every single
morning, and makes sure<n>to reflect on it after.

text_block_list.name: Groundskeeper
text_block_list.text:
Through trial and error, she gets a<n>little faster each day,
improving slowly<n>but surely. Well, all I'm trying to say<n>is...
you might like to think about<n>scouting her!
choice_data_list: Looks like she's already got a devoted fan.

text_block_list.name: Groundskeeper
text_block_list.text:
Haha! You know, you might be right. I<n>do watch her every
morning. Ah, just<n>seeing her hard at work puts a spring<n>in
my step.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Phew... Gotta love being out on a nice<n>day... Oh, I got one!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
"The morning sun is an<n>Umamusume's best growth<n>
hormone"! Hehe, nice one, me!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Just then...

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Ahh!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
A gust of wind snatches up her<n>notebook and delivers it to
my feet. I<n>catch a glimpse of pages packed to<n>the margins
with writing.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: M-my Chiyonotes! Sorry about that!<n>Thank you!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
Oh, um... it's like my entire life<n>squeezed into notebook form!
That's<n>why I call it my Chiyonotes.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
Any lessons I learn, facts I find out, or<n>sayings I come up
with, I write in here.
choice_data_list: That's an admirable habit to have.
That's an admirable habit to have.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
Oh, no, I'm really nothing special... so<n>I just try to do what
little I can, that's<n>all.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: A few days later...

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
I've admired you ever since I started<n>here! When I saw you
run, it was love<n>at first sight!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Chiyono O grips a letter in her shaking<n>hands, cheeks
flushed bright red. I get<n>the feeling I shouldn't be witnessing<n>
this and quickly hide myself.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
One day... one day, I want to stand by<n>your side! That's my
dream! So for<n>now, I just want to get closer to you,<n>one
step at a time.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
I know I'm nowhere near good<n>enough to earn that spot
yet! But... but<n>please give me a chance!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Please do a practice race with me,<n>Maruzen!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
...Maybe I should say more about<n>what exactly I like about
her running.<n>No, that might be too mu—

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Curiosity getting the better of me, I<n>peek my head out only
to find that<n>Chiyono O is talking to herself. As I'm<n>taken
aback by this, our eyes meet.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: D-did you hear all that?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Oh, um, uhh... WAHHH! You saw<n>nothing!
